common.label: Text label displayed above or beside the component
common.disabled: Disables interaction and applies disabled styling
common.readonly: Prevents editing while keeping the value visible and focusable
common.required: Marks the field as mandatory for validation
common.placeholder: Placeholder text shown when no value is entered
common.hint: Helper text displayed beneath the component
common.emptyMessage: Text displayed when no options or results are available
common.disableFloatingLabel: Enables floating-label behavior when focused or filled
common.dropdownMaxItemsVisible: Maximum number of options visible before scrolling
common.color: Visual color variant that defines theme emphasis
common.size: Predefined size controlling dimensions and typography
common.stickyHeader: Makes the table header sticky when scrolling vertically
common.pageSize: The number of items to display per page
common.position: Controls the visual placement of the component on the screen
common.options: Data source for selectable options or items
common.optionKeys: Mapping configuration for custom option object fields (value, text, id)
common.validators: Custom validation functions for domain-specific logic
common.validationMessages: Custom error messages for different validity states
common.columnsToShow: Keys defining which fields of each option should be shown
common.templates: Custom templates for cell, header, or row rendering
common.sort: Configuration for the current sorting state
common.stickyColumns: Number of columns to keep fixed during horizontal scroll

tokens.title: Design Tokens
tokens.description: Design tokens are the visual design atoms of the design system â€” specifically, they are named entities that store visual design attributes.

props.type: Native input type that defines keyboard, validation, and semantics
props.autocomplete: Controls browser autocomplete suggestions for the input
props.min: Minimum numeric value allowed when type is number
props.max: Maximum numeric value allowed when type is number
props.step: Increment step used for numeric input controls
props.pattern: Regular expression used to validate the input value

props.validators: Custom validation functions to check value format
props.validationMessages: Custom error messages for different validity states
props.externalError: External error message that can be set programmatically

props.prefix: Content displayed at the start of the input (icons, text, etc.)
props.suffix: Content displayed at the end of the input (icons, buttons, etc.)
props.text-align: Text alignment of the input value
props.ui-control-padding: Internal padding of the input field
props.ui-control-border-focus: Border color when input is focused
props.ui-control-bg-hover: Background color when hovering over the input

data.inputChange: Emitted on every user input interaction (typing)
data.valueChange: Emitted when the input value is committed or programmatically updated
data.inputBlur: Emitted when the input loses focus
data.validationChange: Emitted after validation completes with the result

props.label: Text content displayed inside the button
props.loading: Shows loading spinner and disables interaction

events.buttonClick: Emitted when the button is clicked

props.apiUrl: Endpoint used to fetch dynamic suggestions
props.apiParams: Additional parameters sent with each API request
props.dropdownMaxItemsVisible: Maximum number of options visible before enabling vertical scroll

data.inputChange: Emitted when the autocomplete value changes
data.optionSelected: Emitted when an option is selected from the dropdown

data.inputChange: Emitted when the selected value changes

props.text: Text displayed to the right of the checkbox
props.checked: Marks the checkbox as checked on initial render
props.indeterminate: Shows the checkbox in an indeterminate visual state

data.inputChange: Emitted when the checkbox state changes

props.direction: Layout direction of the radio group

data.inputChange: Emitted when the selected radio option changes

props.showCheckbox: Show a checkbox for each item in the list
props.showSelectAll: Enable the 'Select all' option for multi-mode

data.valueChange: Emitted when the selected value(s) change
data.newItemClick: Emitted when the 'Add new item' option is clicked

data.searchChange: Emitted when the search value changes
data.searchClear: Emitted when the clear button is clicked

data.inputChange: Emitted when the textarea value changes
data.valueChange: Emitted when the value is committed

props.total: The total number of items to paginate

data.dateChange: Emitted when the selected date(s) change
data.dateClick: Emitted when a date is clicked

props.dateType: Defines whether the picker selects a single date or a date range
props.textOptions: Text configuration for range mode labels and separator

data.inputChange: Emitted when the selected date(s) change

props.icon: Icon name or class used to render the icon inside the button

events.buttonClick: Emitted when the icon button is clicked

props.split: If true, renders split button (main button + icon button)

data.optionSelected: Emitted when an option is selected from the dropdown
data.buttonClick: Emitted when the main button is clicked (split mode)

props.icon: Internal DS icon name. If not provided, the component will render the slotted SVG

props.headers: Column definitions for the table header and data mapping
props.data: Array of objects to be rendered as table rows

data.rowDoubleClick: Emitted when a row is double-clicked
data.sortChange: Emitted when the sort order changes

props.showPaginator: Enables or disables the paginator UI
props.pageSizeOptions: Available options for the page size selector
props.editingKeys: Identifiers of rows currently in edit mode

data.toolbarButtonClick: Emitted when a toolbar button is clicked
data.sortChange: Emitted when the sort order changes

props.cardOptions: Card content options like title, subtitle, image, etc.

data.primaryButtonClick: Emitted when the primary button is clicked
data.secondaryButtonClick: Emitted when the secondary button is clicked

props.show: Controls whether the popup is rendered and visible in the DOM
props.showBackdrop: Toggles the backdrop overlay behind the popup surface
props.status: Visual status indicator displayed before the popup title
props.popupProps: Configuration object for customizing popup content and actions

data.backdropDismiss: Emitted when the backdrop is clicked
data.closeButtonClick: Emitted when the close button is clicked
data.footerButtonClick: Emitted when a footer button is clicked

props.isOpen: Whether the side panel is open
props.closeOnOverlayClick: Whether clicking overlay closes the panel
props.closeOnEscKey: Whether pressing ESC closes the panel

data.panelOpened: Emitted when the panel is opened
data.panelClosed: Emitted when the panel is closed
data.panelCloseCancelled: Emitted when panel close is cancelled

props.text: Determines the text (optional if using a slot)
props.timeout: Determines the timeout (ms). 0 = does not close automatically

data.closed: Emitted when the notification is closed
